inventory.description: Manages stock levels, inter-warehouse transfers, inventory health, and valuation reconciliation in ERPNext.

forecasting.description: Forecasts stock levels and demand for 3-6 months based on sales and purchase data.

ordering.description: Automates material requests and purchase orders, and monitors purchase prices.

pricing.description: Proposes pricing rules and promotions based on stock levels and demand elasticity.

analytics.description: Analyzes sales performance, stock coverage, and product trends to support decision-making.
